items.title: Frontend
items.content: I am passionate about crafting solid and scalable frontend products, utilizing cutting-edge technologies to intuitively implement beautiful and dynamic user experiences.

items.title: Backend
items.content: My experience as a programmer allows me to come up with intelligent solutions to technical challenges, delivering fast and resilient server-side applications optimized for scale.  I write clean, elegant and efficient code and am conversant with modern building practices.

items.title: UI Design
items.content: Though I'm not a typical designer, I have a creative mind, strong attention to detail, and a keen eye for clean and modern design, which I use to build engagingly fluid user experiences. With my strong conceptualization ability, I am able to visualize and create beautiful works.
